choices.answer: Scoring two points in a row
Serving two Aces in a row
Put two tables together to have a larger playing surface

questions.question: The ball is in play until it touches something other than the table, net or paddle.
What does "let" mean in table tennis?

choices.answer: Letting your partner serve in your place
Letting the other team come from behind to win
Letting the other team serve during your turn
The ball hit the net on a serve and the server must re-serve

questions.question: When the receiver fails to return the ball over the net...

choices.answer: The serving team earns a point
The net must be taken down to make it easier

questions.question: A rally describes the time during which the ball is out of play.
An official game is played to 21 points with at least a 2 point advantage over the opponent.
Table tennis equipment includes: a table equipped with a smooth, dark surface and lines, a net, balls and paddles.
In a traditional game of table tennis, each server serves for how many consecutive points?
When serving, in what order should the ball hit certain items?

choices.answer: Server's paddle, server's side, opponent's side

questions.question: When gripping the paddle, you want to imagine "shaking hands" with the paddle.
What does a "volley" mean in table tennis

choices.answer: Illegally hitting the ball before it bounces on your side
Constant hitting back and forth with opponents
Keeping the ball in the air for as long as possible

questions.question: When the ball hits a line on the table, what happens?

choices.answer: Lines are in, so play continues
A point is awarded to the opposing team
The server starts the play over
The ball cannot hit that same line for the remainder of the play

questions.question: What happens when the server fails to make a good serve on the first attempt?

choices.answer: The serving team loses a point
The serving team loses serving privileges
The server gets one more chance to make a good serve
The partner of the server must serve for the remainder of the game

questions.question: Should players touch the table at any time when the ball is in play?
How many times can the ball bounce on one side of the net before the other team is awarded a point?
